actions.desc: The pact drake makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claw.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) slashing damage.
actions.name: Claw

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.desc: The pact drake breathes a calming haze in a 30-foot cone. Creatures in the cone must make a DC 15 Charisma saving throw or be charmed for 1 minute. While charmed, a creature also can't attack up to five creatures of the pact drake's choice. A charmed creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself with a success.
actions.name: Enforced Diplomacy (Recharge 5-6)

actions.desc: The drake targets a single creature within 60 feet that broke the terms of a pact witnessed by the drake. The creature must succeed on a DC 15 Charisma saving throw or be blinded, deafened, and stunned for 1d6 minutes. The conditions can be ended early only with a dispel magic (DC 15) spell or similar magic. When these conditions end, the affected creature has disadvantage on saving throws until it finishes a long rest.
actions.name: Punish Transgressor

damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
name: Pact Drake
senses: darkvision 60 ft., truesight 60 ft., passive Perception 16

special_abilities.desc: Creatures that make a pact or agree to terms while the drake witnesses the agreement are bound by the drake's magic. They have disadvantage on saving throws against scrying by the drake (simply making a successful save against the drake's scrying usually is enough to arouse its suspicion), and they become potential targets for the drake's Punish Transgressor action.
special_abilities.name: Binding Witness

special_abilities.desc: The drake knows if it hears a lie.
special_abilities.name: Sense Falsehood

special_abilities.desc:
A pact drake's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 15). It can cast the following spells, requiring only somatic components:
At will: detect magic
3/day each: arcane eye, clairvoyance, scrying
special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
